note: COD, Cash-In-Advance, Letter of Credit, MasterCard, VISA, American Express, Diner's Club, or Carte Blanche payments are encouraged.
title: Terms Standard terms are Net 30 from date of shipment to credit-approved accounts
No shipments to any account 15 days past due. Aspen Ribbons adds 21% per annum to all past due accounts. You, the customer, are responsible for all collection costs incurred by Aspen Ribbons
Shipping Domestic shipments are handled by U.P.S. International shipments are routed by customer request. Freight charges plus a $1.00 handling charge are added to all invoices

note: Combine products for quantity discount prices on the same order. For example: Order 36 each of two different products at the same time and receive the 72-143 quantity price break for each product.
title: Discounts A 3% discount is applied to all qualifying COD or Cash-In-Advance shipments. MasterCard, VISA, American Express, Diner's Club, Carte Blanche, and Letters of Credit do not receive the 3% discount
End Column Pricing End column pricing is available to those companies who sign our End Column Agreement and agree to purchase $12,000 worth of ribbons per year
Annual Agreements and Contracts Annual agreements can be signed to secure more advantageous pricing. Contracts and purchase orders with extended shipping dates will also be accepted

note: COD, Cash-In-Advance, Letter of Credit, MasterCard, VISA, American Express, Diner's Club, and Carte Blanche
title: MInimums There is a $25.00 minimum order requirement. For orders under the $25.00 minimum, a $7.50 handling charge is added
